mapper.select: SELECT AUCTIONID, BOOKID, STARTPRICE, PRESENTPRICE, SALESNUMBER, BIDNUMBER, ENDTIME FROM AUCTION WHERE BOOKID = #{bookId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUCTION(AUCTIONID, BOOKID, STARTPRICE, PRESENTPRICE, SALESNUMBER, BIDNUMBER, ENDTIME) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{startPrice}, #{presentPrice}, #{salesNumber}, #{bidNumber}, #{endTime})
